title: Woman critical, man serious after bedroom shooting
title_page: Woman critical, man serious after bedroom shooting
maintext:
A man and woman are recovering at a local hospital after someone shot through a house while they were sleeping in bed early today.
Police said an unknown number of individuals began firing on the home in the 4500 block of Gaywood Drive sometime before 1:35 a.m.
Officers noticed a nearby vehicle with two occupants, but they fled when police approached them, according to a news release.
Both of the victims were taken to the hospital in serious condition, but the woman was downgraded to critical condition.
The shooting is under investigation and anyone with information is asked to call police at 260-427-1201 or Crime Stoppers at 260-436-7867.
